channel.title: PeerGuardian2
channel.description:
http://phoenixlabs.org/pg2/ I have bee using this for the last 2 months maybe. I had presumed everyone uses it but i seem to be very very wrong. See below the list of blocked requests over the last day while p2p sharing. Recommended for anyone using torrent programs.
PeerGuardian 2 PeerGuardian 2 is Phoenix Labs’ premier IP blocker for Windows. PeerGuardian 2 integrates support for multiple lists, list editing, automatic updates, and blocking all of IPv4 (TCP, UDP, ICMP, etc), making it the safest and easiest way to protect your privacy on P2P.

most of these are tracking activities, they are mostly employed by companies to track who is downloading their software/material illegally. references : http://torrentfreak.com/search/Peer+Guardian+2 http://thepiratebay.org/blog/86 http://torrentfreak.com/do-p2p-blocklists-keep-you-safe/

item.title: PeerGuardian2
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

I <3 PG2, I’ve been using it for a very long and I’ve downloaded about 15 games, 40 movies, 20 discography’s, and quite a few other programs and not once did I get caught =].

item.title: PeerGuardian2
item.dc:creator: @sup000 sup000
item.description:
@sup000 wrote:

http://phoenixlabs.org/pg2/

I have bee using this for the last 2 months maybe. I had presumed everyone uses it but i seem to be very very wrong. See below the list of blocked requests over the last day while p2p sharing.

Recommended for anyone using torrent programs.

PeerGuardian 2

PeerGuardian 2 is Phoenix Labs’ premier IP blocker for Windows. PeerGuardian 2 integrates support for multiple lists, list editing, automatic updates, and blocking all of IPv4 (TCP, UDP, ICMP, etc), making it the safest and easiest way to protect your privacy on P2P.
